NO_TAKEN_MAILS: You have no taken mails. Use </mails:0> to see all mails and </respond:0> to take one.
ALREADY_OPEN: You already have an open mail request. Please wait until our team responds to you.
MESSAGE_RECIEVED: Your message has been received. Our team will get back to you shortly.
NO_PERMISSION: You have no permissions to run this command.
MAIL_CLOSED: Your mail (ID: %s) has been closed by <@%s>. If you have further questions, feel free to open a new mail.
MAIL_NOT_FOUND: A mail with ID %s has not found.
MAIL_TAKEN_BY: Your mail (ID: %s) has been taken by <@%s>. Please, wait for response.
MAIL_ALREADY_TAKEN: You can't respond to this mail because someone else has already taken it or it's closed.
ALREADY_TAKEN_ANOTHER: You have already taken another mail. Please, respond to it or close it before taking a new one.
LOG_FILE_NOT_FOUND: Unable to find log file for mail ID %s.
ALREADY_IN_WHITELIST: This user is already in whitelist
NOT_IN_WHITELIST: This user is not in whitelist
DM_CHANNEL_NOT_ALLOWED: This command cannot be used in DMs.
